text:
Irish One Directioner Niall Horan is currently on his Flicker Sessions World Tour in support of his upcoming album, Flicker, playing much smaller venues than his 1D days. He promised to those who weren’t able to see him on this tour that he had something in store for 2018, and boy did he deliver!

Explore See latest videos, charts and news Maren Morris Niall Horan See latest videos, charts and news

Horan is heading on a lengthy North American tour next year with the support of chart topping country star Maren Morris — with whom Horan collaborated for a track on his new album — starting on July 18, 2018 in Texas. His 2018 tour announcement follows the reveal of his album cover and release date, Oct. 20.

Related Niall Horan Begins Summer Tour With Solo One Direction Throwback

Tickets for the 2018 shows go on sale Friday (Sept. 22) at 10am local time, but Citi cardmembers will have access to presale tickets on Tuesday (Sept. 19) at 10am. Check presale ticket information here, and take a look at all of Horan’s tour dates for 2017 and 2018 below.

He promised to those who weren't able to see him on this tour that he had something in store for 2018, and boy did he deliver! Horan is heading on a lengthy North American tour next year with the support of chart topping country star Maren Morris -- with whom Horan collaborated for a track on his new album -- starting on July 18, 2018 in Texas.
